name: Waves of Light (Demo)
description:
Waves of Light is dedicated to those who have mental struggles such as anxiety, depression, and suicidal thinking.

This is the demo version for the game as it is still in development. If you would like to talk to us directly, you can reply at the bottom of the page or you can visit the Discord server, Red Panda Hub, at https://discord.gg/uf6EBdN. This is also where you can find out how to donate to the making of this game!

We do all of this without any payments, and any and all support whether donations or sharing this with others will be of huge help for us to continue developing this game!
